name: Brick In
description:
This is my game for Ludum Dare 42. The theme was "Running Out of Space".

This is an inverted Break Out clone, where the bricks are being added to the level and you must bounce them out.

1 point for each brick you hit, 5 points when you bounce one right out of the brick pit.

Game ends when you are forced to the top of the pit or more than 10 bricks pile up above you.

Controls:

Left & Right  or A & D

Esc to quit from main menu.

Esc to return to main menu from game.
